sentences.en: B : focus on teamwork, interpersonal, inter - departmental communication and coordination with each other.
sentences.cn: 注重团队合作精神, 人与人之间, 部门与部门之间相互沟通与协调.

sentences.en: Believing each other is the basic of good interpersonal relation.
sentences.cn: 彼此信任是良好人际关系的基础.

sentences.en: Besides, I am a team player and have great interpersonal skills.
sentences.cn: 而且我具有团队精神和出色的人际关系技能.

sentences.en: But interpersonal and always need to keep certain distance.
sentences.cn: 但是人与人之间又总是要保持一定的距离.

sentences.en: Good communication and interpersonal skills. Strong responsibility and independent working capability.
sentences.cn: 有良好的交流和沟通能力, 有较强的责任心和独立工作能力.

sentences.en: Good presentation, administrative and interpersonal skills are a must.
sentences.cn: 必须具有良好的表达 、 行政管理和人际交往能力.

sentences.en: Good professional ethics, good communication skills and sociality, interpersonal skills.
sentences.cn: 有良好的职业道德, 有公共关系的沟通能力.

sentences.en: Good team player, good at project operation and interpersonal communication.
sentences.cn: 优秀的团队合作精神, 项目运作能力及沟通能力.

sentences.en: Leading is concerned with the interpersonal relations of managers and nonmanagers.
sentences.cn: 领导与管理者、非管理者的人事关系有关.

sentences.en: Mature interpersonal skills, pleasant personality and a team player.
sentences.cn: 善于维护人际关系技巧, 个性开朗能适应团队生活.

sentences.en: Money is nothing but a medium of interpersonal exchange.
sentences.cn: 货币只是一种交换媒介.

sentences.en: The complexities of interpersonal relations bothered her.
sentences.cn: 人际关系的复杂情况使她困惑不已.

sentences.en: The course is intended to increase student's interpersonal skills.
sentences.cn: 这个课程旨在提高学生与人交流的技巧.

sentences.en: The harmonious interpersonal relationship inevitably is one kind of good condition.
sentences.cn: 和谐的人际关系必然是一种良好的状态.

sentences.en: Training in interpersonal skills is essential.
sentences.cn: 人际交往技巧的培训非常必要。

phrases.tran_cn: 人际沟通；人际传播；人际交流
人际关系技巧，人际交往能力

trans.tran_cn: 人与人之间的，人际的，人与人之间的关系的，涉及人与人之间的关系的
